search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Documentero (documentero.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I could not locate a direct URL to the official pricing page for Documentero. You might want to check their official website at [documentero.com](https://www.documentero.com) for more details.

extracted_content.content:
Documentero - Document Generation & Automation Software
=============== 

 [![Image 1: Documentero Logo](https://www.documentero.com/custom/LogoWhite.svg) ![Image 2: Documentero Logo](https://www.documentero.com/custom/logo.svg)](https://www.documentero.com/#)

[](javascript:void(0);)

[Templates](https://www.documentero.com/#templates) [Forms](https://www.documentero.com/#forms) [API](https://www.documentero.com/#api) [Spreadsheets](https://www.documentero.com/#spreadsheets) [AI](https://www.documentero.com/#chatgpt) [Integrations](https://www.documentero.com/#integrations) [Pricing](https://www.documentero.com/#pricing)

[PL](https://documentero.pl/) [Docs](https://docs.documentero.com/) [Blog](https://blog.documentero.com/) [Login](https://app.documentero.com/login)

Get Started

Document Generation & Automation
================================

Generate **Word & PDF** documents from custom [templates](https://www.documentero.com/#templates) using [API](https://www.documentero.com/#api), [Shareable Forms](https://www.documentero.com/#forms), [Spreadsheets](https://www.documentero.com/#spreadsheets) or [AI](https://www.documentero.com/#chatgpt)

Integrations with 5000+ Apps using Zapier, Make and more...

Get started - It's free

![Image 3: DOCX Format](https://www.documentero.com/custom/doc-svgrepo-com.svg) ![Image 4: PDF Format](https://www.documentero.com/custom/pdf-svgrepo-com.svg)

![Image 5: App Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/landing4.png)

1

Word & PDF Automated Document Generation Software
-------------------------------------------------

#### Document Template Software. Learn Fast, Work Smart.

PausePlay

% buffered00:00

00:00

UnmuteMute

CaptionsDisabledQualityundefinedSpeedNormal

CaptionsGo back to previous menu

PIPExit fullscreenEnter fullscreen

 

Play

![Image 6: Template Icon](https://www.documentero.com/assets/img/graphics/icons/study-core.svg)

#### Create Template

Create template online using our online builder or upload your .docx (Word) template prepared in your editor, enter special tags in places that you want to control

![Image 7: Configure Icon](https://www.documentero.com/assets/img/graphics/icons/learn-core.svg)

#### Configure Form or API

Decide how each template field should be represented on web form (e.g. datepicker/multiselect/text) or integrate with your system using Cloud API.

![Image 8: Create Icon](https://www.documentero.com/assets/img/graphics/icons/aquire-core.svg)

#### Generate Documents

Generate _Word_ or _PDF_ documents using Web Forms or API. You can receive documents by email.

2

Integrate your Process
----------------------

#### No more manual document creation

### Save Time

You are preparing the document template once. Afterward, you can enjoy Word & PDF Automated Document Generation.

### Use your editor

We support docx file format. You can use any software to create your document templates: Microsoft **Word, Google Docs, LibreOffice**...

### Easy to use

You don't need any technical knowledge to automate your document generation. Our documents templates are as easy to create as any regular document

### Consistency & Validation

Your documents always follow template patterns. They are formatted correctly and prone to any human errors during manual data enter (like missing parts)

3

Templates Key Features
----------------------

#### Organize your document template using special tags

*   Fields
*   Sections
*   Smart Fields
*   Smart Sections
*   Images
*   HTML/Markdown
*   Charts/Diagrams

![Image 9: Fields Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/fields.PNG)

Template Fields
---------------

You need to provide placeholders in the document template (**field name in curly brackets**). It's as simple as that.

If the same field is repeated in other parts of the template we will detect that and fill the document accordingly (with the value provided only once).

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMt2iQ4puL4&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=1) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/)

![Image 10: Sections Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/sections.PNG)

Template Sections
-----------------

If you want to show/hide some part of the document conditionally you can use a special section tag that starts with **"#"**.

Sections could have subfields inside and they can work in singular or multiple modes ( e.g. You can use them to render a table/lists/parametrized paragraph.)

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMt2iQ4puL4&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=1) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/)

![Image 11: Smart Fields Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/smartfields.PNG)

Smart Fields
------------

Smart fields use a special tag that starts with **"$"**. They cannot be provided by a user. Those fields are build or calculated based on existing nonsmart regular fields. They can be used for simple or advanced automated calculations from provided values or other combinations like concatenating text.

This type of fields supports smart conditions and calculations.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMt2iQ4puL4&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=1) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/)

![Image 12: Smart Sections Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/smartsections.PNG)

Smart Sections
--------------

Smart sections use a special tag that starts with **"#$"**. They cannot be provided by a user.

They support calculations and conditions on regular fields. The difference is that they can show or hide part of the template (like a paragraph or some text that appears based on some condition or value is higher than x).

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMt2iQ4puL4&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=1) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/)

![Image 13: Images](https://www.documentero.com/custom/images.png)

Images
------

You can add dynamic images into your templates using **"%"** prefix.

You can inject logos, photos or images into your documents dynamically. It's possible using special field type (available in API mode using Base64 format or image URL).

[Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/)

![Image 14: Images](https://www.documentero.com/custom/html.png)

HTML / Markdown Support
-----------------------

You can add HTML Field into your templates using **"\*"** or **"!"** prefix.

Users have the capability to input content in HTML or Markdown format within designated fields of their document template. The platform is designed to seamlessly transform these inputs into Docx/PDF formats, supporting a wide array of HTML / Markdown elements. These elements include, but are not limited to formatted text, headers, tables, links, images, as well as ordered and unordered lists.

[Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/fields-html-support)

![Image 15: Images](https://www.documentero.com/custom/mermaid.png)

Mermaid Support
---------------

You can add Charts/Diagrams into your templates inside HTML/Markdown syntax.

Users have the capability to include charts, diagrams, and other visual elements using the Mermaid syntax within designated fields of their document template. The platform is designed to seamlessly interpret Mermaid code and render it as fully visualized diagrams in the final Docx/PDF output. Supported diagram types include, but are not limited to, flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, Gantt charts, and entity-relationship models. This feature enables users to embed complex, structured visual content using simple, text-based definitions directly within their document generation workflow.

[Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/templates/fields-mermaid-support)

Word document templates examples
--------------------------------

![Image 16](https://www.documentero.com/custom/CardSample2.png)

Business Card

Sample Business Card template. You can automate creation of documents of all kinds, sizes and styles.

[Template](https://www.documentero.com/files/sample_business_card.docx) [Generate using app](https://app.documentero.com/form/CFWR52ZZ8VwLTKJsAYxK)

![Image 17](https://www.documentero.com/custom/RentalSample2.png)

Rental Agreement

Agreement that calculates Rental fee based on provided values. Optional section if client is insured

[Template](https://www.documentero.com/files/sample_rental_agreement.docx) [Generate using app](https://app.documentero.com/form/53CW0Hn9mZm8Ufui6fbP)

![Image 18](https://www.documentero.com/custom/InvoiceSample2.png)

Invoice Template

Invoice Document with dynamic table and fields that are calculated (Price with Tax, Totals)

[Template](https://www.documentero.com/files/sample_invoice.docx) [Generate using app](https://app.documentero.com/form/a9AnwtaEw7vaPliAF7S6)

4

Shareable Form Features
-----------------------

#### Gather all document required information on customizable form

*   Form Designer
*   Share Link
*   Send Emails
*   Embed on Website

![Image 19: Form Designer Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/customizableForm4.PNG)

Form Designer
-------------

Once you upload your template, application automatically prepare easy to use web form.

You can customize it by changing each field/section representation (textfield, datepicker, selectbox, radio select, checkbox...), order, description, label. Feel free to re-order fields, divide them into groups, and set them as "required fields".

**Conditional Fields Support** You can also conditionally show or hide fields based on user input and selections within the form.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSa2BESpAyE&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=2) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/forms/how-to-customize-document-form)

![Image 20: Shared Link Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/sharedLink.PNG)

Share Link
----------

For every form, you can generate a public share link. Others can fill up your documents for you using a pre-setup form.

You have full control over messages before and after successful submission, you can also allow download documents to submitter, everything is configurable.

Once person that you share link with fill up form successfully you will be notified with email and ready to use document as attachment

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSa2BESpAyE&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=2) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/forms/shared-forms)

![Image 21: Email Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/ExampleEmail2.PNG)

Send Emails
-----------

If you use share link-filled, ready to use documents will land on your email inbox instantly, together with the submitter's email and name.

You can also email/notify the submitter with confirmation or attached document if you configure to do so.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSa2BESpAyE&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=2) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/forms/shared-forms)

![Image 22: Email Examples](https://www.documentero.com/custom/embedlight.jpg)

Embeed on Website
-----------------

Once you create and customize your shared form that can generate documents using our platform then can embed it on your website as a widget.

This dynamic form feature inherently adapts its dimensions and layout to the space allocated on your website, thereby enabling the streamlined generation of documents directly from your website.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSa2BESpAyE&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=2) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/forms/shared-forms)

5

Cloud API Service
-----------------

#### Integrate Documentero with your system using our API Service

*   API Service
*   Generate From JSON

![Image 23: Api Request Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/apirequest2.png)

Cloud API Service
-----------------

You can integrate Documentero - Document Generation Tool with your system or automated process using our Cloud Software.

Once you upload your template you can call our RESTful API with template identifier, apiKey assigned to your account, and JSON with data for individual fields in your document. Our Cloud service will generate ready-to-use documents in seconds

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yP8Ci8hOqhc&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=3) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/api/)

![Image 24: Api Json Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/apiJSON.PNG)

Generate from JSON
------------------

For each document, we will generate a sample API call based on detected in template fields and sections. You just need to replace JSON values with data that should be injected into document templates.

You can call our Cloud API endpoint for your document templates using prefilled JSON Editor on our web platform.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yP8Ci8hOqhc&list=PLY_ZUS_7tJGDBUaynH4ubdlEkYKSS7jkh&index=3) [Documentation](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/api/)

![Image 25: Example Email](https://www.documentero.com/custom/ExampleEmail2.PNG)

Send Emails
-----------

If you use share link-filled, ready to use documents will land on your email inbox instantly, together with the submitter's email and name.

You can also email/notify the submitter with confirmation or attached document if you configure to do so.

[Learn more](https://docs.documentero.com/documentation/forms/shared-forms)

6

Spreadsheets
------------

#### Bulk Generate Word & PDF Documents from Spreadsheet

![Image 26: Spreadsheet](https://www.documentero.com/custom/spreadsheet.png)

Generate multiple documents
---------------------------

Create multiple documents in one click using convenient **Bulk Spreadsheet Document Generation**, you can now effortlessly produce batch of documents based on your spreadsheet data (CSV / Excel / Google Sheets).

Provide or copy-paste data into spreadsheet (e.g. copy from CSV, Google Sheets or Excel). Each row represents data for one document.

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=86I7iiQ2mkg)

7

AI Content Generation
---------------------

#### Integrate Documentero with AI to automate document creation

![Image 27: Api Request Example](https://www.documentero.com/custom/chatgpt2.png)

ChatGPT Integration
-------------------

Say goodbye to the time-consuming and tedious task of crafting documents from scratch. With our advanced Integration with **OpenAI ChatGPT**, you can now effortlessly produce professional-quality documents tailored to your unique needs.

Simply input what kind of document you want to generate, describe desired content for fields in your template and let ChatGPT do the heavy lifting. (OpenAI API Key required)

[Video Tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_dHn_JSqSqI&t=320s)

Create smart, beatiful documents
--------------------------------

You can use any docx. (Microsoft Word) format capabilities - we support them.

All styles, headers are going to be considered including replaced values. Parts of document could be conditionally hidden or calculated/formatted.

![Image 28: Document Styled](https://www.documentero.com/custom/InvoiceTemplate2.png)

8

Pricing
-------

#### We keep it simple. Start for free

Try our service for free

*   Unlimited Pages & Fields
*   Shareable Forms + Emails
*   Cloud API Service

9

Integrations
------------

#### Easy integrations with 5000+ Apps using [Zapier](https://zapier.com/apps/documentero/integrations), [Make.com](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/09/20/create-documents-make/) [Integrately](https://integrately.com/integrations/documentero) or [Pabbly Connect](https://www.pabbly.com/connect/integrations/Documentero/).

#### Dedicated no-code app development platform integration - [Bubble.io Plugin](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/10/01/bubble-plugin/), [WebFlow App](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/11/02/webflow-app/)

[Zapier Tutorial](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/03/25/create-documents-zapier/) [Make.com Tutorial](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/09/20/create-documents-make/) [Pabbly Connect Tutorial](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/05/16/create-documents-pabbly-connect/) [Bubble.io Tutorial](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/10/01/bubble-plugin/) [WebFlow Tutorial](https://blog.documentero.com/2023/11/02/webflow-app/)

8

Let's dive in
-------------

#### Get started right away.

Get Started - It's free

No Credit Card Required

### What text editors are compatible with Documentero?

Any editor that supports .docx format: Microsoft Word, Google Docs, LibreWriter, OpenOffice, Mobile Office

### Do I need technical knowledge to use this app?

Not at all. Anyone who can create document templates in our online editor or docx format can use Documentero easily. If you want to integrate your system/solution using API technical person should be involved.

### Can I use Documentero on mobile device?

Yes. Our application adapts to device that is used. On phone it behaves like an mobile app

### Are you storing data entered to documents?

No. We use data to generate documents once. We generate a special download link that expires in a few minutes after document download. After that document and entered data is deleted from memory. It makes the process more secure for you and your data. We are storing only document templates

At Documentero, we prioritize the protection of your privacy. Our software is intentionally designed to refrain from storing documents customer data or generated documents. For further details, we encourage you to review our comprehensive Privacy Policy.

[Privacy Policy](https://documentero.com/privacy-policy) [Terms & Conditions](https://documentero.com/terms-conditions)

How would you like to start ?

Signup to App

Create account and start right away

Documentation

Check our documentation

Video Tutorials

Watch how our application works on youtube

Close

Turn your documents into templates that can generate .docx or .pdf documents using shareable forms or API
